official_title: Effect of Continuous Glucose Monitor Application Following Hospital Discharge of Poorly Controlled Patients With Type 2 Diabetes and Active Malignancy
inclusion_criteria:
* Type 2 diabetes
* Insulin use > 10 units per day
* Hemoglobin A1c > 8.5%
* Smart phone compatible with LibreView App
Healthy volunteers allowed
exclusion_criteria:
* Type 1 diabetes mellitus (DM)
* Inability to consent
* Pregnancy
* Prisoners
* Discharge to skilled nursing facility
